title: Estimating lambda — est_lambda
text: data data frame inputted user containing summary statistics exposure outcome GWASs. must least five columns column names SNP, beta.exposure, beta.outcome, se.exposure, se.outcome. row must correspond unique SNP, identified SNP. z.threshold value

title: Main function for MR-SimSS — mr_simss
text: mr_simss function based simulated sample splitting order alleviate Winner's Curse bias MR causal effect estimates. also takes account sample overlap exposure outcome GWASs. uses GWAS summary statistics together knowledge number overlapping samples correlation exposure outcome. works combination existing MR methods, IVW MR-RAPS.

title: Main function for MR-SimSS — mr_simss
code: mr_simss(   data,   est.lambda = FALSE,   lambda.val = 0,   n.exposure = 1,   n.outcome = 1,   n.overlap = 1,   cor.xy = 0,   n.iter = 1000,   splits = 2,   pi = 0.5,   pi2 = 0.5,   threshold = 5e-08,   mr_method = "mr_ivw",   parallel = TRUE,   n.cores = NULL )

title: Main function for MR-SimSS — mr_simss
text: data data frame inputted user containing summary statistics exposure outcome GWASs. must least five columns column names SNP, beta.exposure, beta.outcome, se.exposure se.outcome. row must correspond unique SNP, identified SNP. est.lambda logical value. lambda.val numerical value. n.exposure numerical value specified user equal number individuals exposure GWAS. n.outcome numerical value specified user equal number individuals outcome GWAS. n.overlap numerical value specified user equal number individuals exposure outcome GWAS. cor.xy numerical value specified user equal observed correlation exposure outcome. value must -1 1. n.iter numerical value specifies number iterations method, .e. number times sample splits randomly simulated. default setting n.iter=1000. splits numerical value must equal 2 3, indicating whether splits 2 3 simulated. recommended case overlap two GWASs splits 2 used presence overlap, especially full overlap, splits 3 used. default setting splits=2. pi numerical value . default setting pi=0.5. pi2 numerical value . default setting pi2=0.5. threshold numerical value. default setting threshold=5e-8. mr_method string. default setting mr_method="mr_ivw". parallel logical value . default setting parallel=TRUE. n.cores numerical value . default setting n.cores=NULL.

title: Simulating 2 splits — split2
code: split2(   data,   est.lambda = FALSE,   lambda.val = 0,   n.exposure,   n.outcome,   n.overlap,   cor.xy,   pi = 0.5,   mr_method = "mr_ivw",   threshold = 5e-08 )

title: Simulating 2 splits — split2
text: data data frame inputted user containing summary statistics exposure outcome GWASs. must least five columns column names SNP, beta.exposure, beta.outcome, se.exposure, se.outcome. row must correspond unique SNP, identified SNP. est.lambda logical value. lambda.val numerical value. n.exposure numerical value specified user equal number individuals exposure GWAS. n.outcome numerical value specified user equal number individuals outcome GWAS. n.overlap numerical value specified user equal number individuals exposure outcome GWAS. cor.xy numerical value specified user equal observed correlation exposure outcome. value must -1 1. pi numerical value. default setting pi=0.5. mr_method string. default setting mr_method="mr_ivw". threshold numerical value. default setting threshold=5e-8.

title: Simulating 3 splits — split3
code: split3(   data,   est.lambda = FALSE,   lambda.val = 0,   n.exposure,   n.outcome,   n.overlap,   cor.xy,   pi = 0.5,   pi2 = 0.5,   mr_method = "mr_ivw",   threshold = 5e-08 )

title: Simulating 3 splits — split3
text: data data frame inputted user containing summary statistics exposure outcome GWASs. must least five columns column names SNP, beta.exposure, beta.outcome, se.exposure se.outcome. row must correspond unique SNP, identified SNP. est.lambda logical value. lambda.val numerical value. n.exposure numerical value specified user equal number individuals exposure GWAS. n.outcome numerical value specified user equal number individuals outcome GWAS. n.overlap numerical value specified user equal number individuals exposure outcome GWAS. cor.xy numerical value specified user equal observed correlation exposure outcome. value must -1 1. pi numerical value. default setting pi=0.5. pi2 numerical value . default setting pi2=0.5. mr_method string. default setting mr_method="mr_ivw". threshold numerical value. default setting threshold=5e-8.
